SourceProxy.name: HyperTreeGridGenerateFields
SourceProxy.label: HyperTreeGrid Generate Fields

Documentation.short_help: Compute cell/field data arrays for HTG leaves

SourceProxy.Documentation: Create cell/field data arrays for HTG leaves. Each field can be enabled/disabled and its output array can be renamed. Please note that some field data arrays may rely on cell data arrays, so disabling cell data arrays may cause warnings and prevent field data arrays from being computed.

IntVectorProperty.name: ComputeCellSizeArray
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/disable the computation of the CellSize array. Default is true.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellSizeArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Name of the cell size array in the output.

IntVectorProperty.name: ComputeValidCellArray
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/disable the computation of the ValidCell array. Default is true.

StringVectorProperty.name: ValidCellArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Name of the cell validity array in the output.

IntVectorProperty.name: ComputeCellCenterArray
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/disable the computation of the CellCenter array. Default is true.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellCenterArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Name of the cell center array in the output.

IntVectorProperty.name: ComputeTotalVisibleVolumeArray
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/disable the computation of the TotalVisibleVolume array. ValidCell and CellSize cell data arrays are required to compute TotalVisibleVolume. If any of them is disabled, a warning will be generated and TotalVisibleVolume will not be computed. Default is true.

StringVectorProperty.name: TotalVisibleVolumeArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Name of the total visible volume array in the output. ValidCell and CellSize cell data arrays are required to compute TotalVisibleVolume. If any of them is disabled, a warning will be generated and TotalVisibleVolume will not be computed.

SourceProxy.name: HyperTreeGridDepthLimiter
SourceProxy.label: HyperTreeGrid Depth Limiter

Documentation.short_help: Limit HTG nodes to a maximum depth

SourceProxy.Documentation: Extract all levels down to a specified depth from a hyper tree grid. If the required depth is greater or equal to the maximum level of the input grid, then the output is identical. Note that when a material mask is present, the geometry extent of the output grid is guaranteed to contain that of the input tree, but the former might be strictly larger than the latter. This is not a bug but an expected behavior of which the user should be aware.

IntVectorProperty.name: SetDepth
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Maximum depth to which the output grid should be limited.

SourceProxy.name: HyperTreeGridEvaluateCoarse
SourceProxy.label: HyperTreeGrid Evaluate Coarse

Documentation.short_help: Evaluate the Value to Coarse Cells from those of children.

SourceProxy.Documentation: This filter evaluates the value of each coarse cell from the values ​​assigned to its children according to different calculation methods (Min, Max, Sum, Average, Elder Child, etc).

SourceProxy.name: HyperTreeGridGeometry
SourceProxy.label: HyperTreeGrid Geometry Filter

Documentation.short_help: Generate external surface of a HTG.

SourceProxy.Documentation: Generate PolyData representing the external surface of a HTG.

IntVectorProperty.name: FillMaterial
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If disabled, only draw the interface (lines). Otherwise, draw the full cell with interface (poly).

SourceProxy.name: HyperTreeGridToDualGrid
SourceProxy.label: HyperTreeGrid To Dual Grid

Documentation.long_help: Convert HyperTreeGrid to the dual UnstructuredGrid.
Documentation.short_help: Convert HyperTreeGrid to the dual UnstructuredGrid.

SourceProxy.Documentation: This filter converts vtkHyperTreeGrid data to vtkUnstructuredGrid, using the dual grid. The converted output consumes much more memory but is compatible with most of the standard filters.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the input to the converter.

SourceProxy.name: HyperTreeGridToUnstructuredGrid
SourceProxy.label: HyperTreeGrid To UnstructuredGrid
SourceProxy.Documentation: This filter converts vtkHyperTreeGrid data to vtkUnstructuredGrid. The converted output consumes much more memory but is compatible with most of the standard filters.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the input to the converter.
